Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic book and the main character, Human Meteor, setting the stage for the adventures to come.

sub_scenes.title: Comic Book Cover Reveal
sub_scenes.description: The cover page introduces the Human Meteor, his abilities, and hints at an upcoming underwater threat.

Major_Arcs.title: The Waterfront Mystery and Transformation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Duke's taxi ride to the waterfront, his suspicion of being followed, and his dramatic transformation into the Human Meteor to confront the unknown threat.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicious Surveillance
sub_scenes.description: Duke picks up wealthy passengers, drives to the waterfront, and notices a G-Man's car following him, creating suspense.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Followers

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into the Human Meteor when the G-Man's car overtakes him, initiating his superhero persona.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Human Meteor Transformation

Major_Arcs.title: Cop Shooters and Hospital Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Human Meteor's confrontation with 'cop shooters', his subsequent injury and hospital visit, and the revelation of a Japanese submarine conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Rooftop Confrontation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts 'cop shooters' leading to a rooftop fight and his apparent injury.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Conspiracy and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: In the hospital, Human Meteor learns about a 'Jap sub' conspiracy and plans to investigate with Toby's help.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Jap Sub Conspiracy

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Toby's Peril
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on events aboard the yacht 'Marlin', Pete's depth chart discovery, Toby's capture, and Duke's reaction to the unfolding situation.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Setup and Depth Chart Clue
sub_scenes.description: Scenes on the yacht deck and in Pete's cabin establish the setting and Pete discovers a depth chart with marked locations.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Plight and Duke's Premonition
sub_scenes.description: Toby is thrown overboard, Duke senses something is wrong, and the yacht crew confirms the submarine connection and decides to contact Duke.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby's Plunge and Cry for Help

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Confrontation and Namor's Attack
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Human Meteor's underwater intervention, his discovery of the sunken submarine, encounters with divers, and Namor's explosive attacks on the submarine and ship.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives from the yacht, discovers the sunken submarine, and encounters hostile divers.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Fight and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor fights the divers while the submarine crew prepares to escape, leading to a chaotic underwater struggle.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Spot and Approach Human Meteor
Divers Attack Human Meteor with Derogatory Remark
Continuing Underwater Confrontation and Diver's Mishap

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Explosive Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Namor surfaces and attacks both the submarine and the ship, causing damage and casualties.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Observes Geyser and Prepares to Evade

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Peter's Treachery Revealed
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Duke's return to the yacht, his search for the depth map, the revelation of Peter's betrayal, and the subsequent actions to address the conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Return to Yacht and Depth Map Search
sub_scenes.description: Duke escapes the underwater chaos, returns to the yacht, and searches Peter's cabin for the depth map.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Escapes and Arrives at the Yacht
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Peter's Betrayal and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: The depth map reveals Peter's treachery, leading to a speedboat chase, hospital visit to Holden, and Duke's return home after a long day.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends and Ambulance Scene
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new setting and characters, depicting the Liberty Lads fighting Nazi fiends and a separate scene with an ambulance arriving at a house.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Action Panel
sub_scenes.description: A single panel depicting the Liberty Lads in action against 'Nazi fiends'.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Man
sub_scenes.description: Two boys observe an ambulance arriving and an injured man being carried into a house.

Major_Arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and Bronson Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows two boys who find a dropped wallet, leading them to a bus garage and a dangerous encounter involving Major Bronson and a sinister plan.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Discovery and Garage Visit
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a wallet dropped by a man from the ambulance, leading them to a bus company garage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Chase
Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Disguised

sub_scenes.title: Garage Confrontation and Deadly Plan
sub_scenes.description: Boys return the wallet at the garage, are led to Mr. Horst, interrogated, and face Bronson's deadly carbon monoxide plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Returned, Boys to See the Boss

Major_Arcs.title: Barracks Attack and Sabotage Unveiled
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the boys' struggle against Bronson, the discovery of sabotage plans, the barracks attack, and the Marines' intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Uprising, Threats and Bronson's Violence
sub_scenes.description: An uprising begins, Mr. Horst threatens the boys, and Bronson violently intervenes, shooting someone.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Discovering Sabotage
sub_scenes.description: The boys split up to seek help, Chuck encounters a Marine Sergeant, and Skip discovers a secret office with sabotage plans.

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Breach and Office Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: An alert at the Marine Barracks leads to a car crashing into the building and a confrontation within an office.

sub_scenes.title: Marines' Arrival, Major's Injury and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, engage in a fight, discover Major's injury, and celebrate victory over 'Nazi spies'.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Rosita Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry, their mission against 'Hitler tools', and their entanglement in the kidnapping of President's daughter Rosita in South America.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and South American Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of 'The Champ' and Henry in a desert scene, followed by their discovery and confrontation in a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery and Confrontation in South America

sub_scenes.title: Detention and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Americans are detained and interrogated, revealing suspicions about Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre and Rosita's Rescue Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a separate storyline involving 'El Tigre', his men, and their surprising mission to rescue Rosita, leading to a complex series of actions and confrontations.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Car Ride and Mama's Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Two men are forced into a car and driven to 'Mama', who reveals a plan to rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Entry
Arrival, Mama's Reveal, and Rosita's Rescue

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Hideout Infiltration and Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Planning for hideout approach, entering El Tigre's hideout, stage dollar diversion and El Tigre's dramatic reveal.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and El Tigre's Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and El Tigre's Denial
sub_scenes.description: Garbage bin interrogation, search for Rosita, and El Tigre denies kidnapping, blaming Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Ride and Hotel Assault
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita's imprisonment prompts El Tigre to plan a rescue, leading to a determined ride and hotel assault.

narrative_arcs.title: News of Rosita and the Rescue Plan
The Determined Ride to Rescue Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Climax of Rosita Rescue and Government Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Various fight scenes during the rescue operation, culminating in government troops arriving and taking over.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Protective Stand

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Devil Dog Dolan's jungle mission, his combat, capture, and the events leading to his compromised situation.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and a soldier reporting a 'grave matter' involving Dolan and Captain Lawton.

sub_scenes.title: Disobeyed Orders and Jungle Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Officer's anger over disobeyed orders, Dolan's reassurance, and his arrival and ambush in the jungle.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity, Torture and Compromise
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's captivity, torture threats, actual torture, and his awakening to an interrogation by a foreign agent.

narrative_arcs.title: Brought Before Grauer and Suspicious Object
Orders, Forced Writing, and Torture Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Dolan's Vengeance and Native Alliance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Dolan's vengeful actions, including burning huts, his justification for these actions, and his subsequent alliance with the natives after defeating their chief.

sub_scenes.title: Burning Huts and Justification
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions of setting fire, flashback to Sam burning, and Grauer's orders amidst burning huts.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback: Sam Burning and Dolan's Grim Justification
Grauer's Indifference and Orders Amidst Burning Huts
Dolan's Justification for Burning and Vengeful Declaration

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight, Chief's Death and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Jungle ambush, chief's accidental death, natives' homage, and formation of an alliance with Dolan.

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the Captain's internal conflict, Sam's fight, and the disciplinary action taken against Dolan, highlighting themes of duty and service.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Son's Fight
sub_scenes.description: Captain contemplates surrender, reflects on duty, and discovers his son Sam in a fight.

sub_scenes.title: Discipline and Service Lesson
sub_scenes.description: Dolan receives disciplinary spanking but learns a lesson about service and duty.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the 'Twinkle Twins' investigating a murder mystery, starting with a city street confrontation and leading to a complex investigation.

sub_scenes.title: City Street Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the 'Twinkle Twins' and a city street confrontation with a gunman.

narrative_arcs.title: City Street Confrontation with Twinkle Twins

sub_scenes.title: Murder Assignment and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins are assigned a murder case, investigate evidence against Tom Reilly, visit police and hospital to find Guy Reilly and Miss Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Guy Reilly
Hospital Reception and Inquiry about Miss Reilly
Persuasion and Access to Miss Reilly
Meeting Miss Reilly - The Sick Little Girl

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion Crisis and New Leads
sub_scenes.description: Hospital staff plea for help for Miss Reilly, blood type mismatch revealed, and a new lead emerges about Farnacci and Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Sympathy for Miss Reilly and Blood Type Discussion
Candy Store and Phone Call to Elijah
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Elijah's Instructions: Connect Farnacci, Banker, Haskel, and Brown
Radio Broadcast about Farnacci's Gang and Banker Threat
Decision to Look for Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish section and Mrs. Murphy reveals Tom Reilly's sacrifice.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation: Tom Reilly's Sacrifice

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ambush, Pursuit and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Taxi ambush occurs, Dan witnesses it, pursuit begins, neighborhood helps, street brawl and police intervention leads to capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ambush and Dan as Witness

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Aftermath and Blood Transfusion Success
sub_scenes.description: Hospital transport, waiting for news, blood appeal, community response, transfusion, and Reilly's revival.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Mismatch and Community Appeal
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Happy Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Public outcry against Farnacci, police intervention, pool room investigation, Farnacci's arrest, and celebration of Lassie's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Police Intervention and Media Coverage
Accusation and Denial Regarding Blood Donation
Confirmation of Farnacci's Gang Affiliation and Impending Arrest
Celebration of Recovery and Future Adventures
